creditline: Gift of The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: An open book (or diary) with writing on one page and drawing on the opposite page; on R panel (page): the rear end of a canoe superimposed against a background of messy writing, much of which has been crossed out or partially erased; the L panel (page) is a predominantly blue composition with moments of other colors; annotations and blue scribbling around margins
marks:
Signature; Date; Inscription

 LR: [P. Barber \'81]; in graphite, LC: [fields-two
title: Study for "Either or (both)"
